entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
